question.title: Spring h2-console not opening on my browser
question.body:
I have a problem regarding my h2-console i am following a spring-boot tutorial on udimy and i did exactly as the isntructor. He opened the h2 datanase console in the browser but for some reason it didn't work for me

this is my pom.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
    <parent>
        <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
        <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId>
        <version>4.0.0-M3</version>
        <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository -->
    </parent>
    <groupId>rayan.springframework</groupId>
    <artifactId>springfs-pet-clinic</artifactId>
    <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version>
    <name>springfs-pet-clinic</name>
    <description>Demo project for Spring Boot</description>
    <url/>
    <licenses>
        <license/>
    </licenses>
    <developers>
        <developer/>
    </developers>
    <scm>
        <connection/>
        <developerConnection/>
        <tag/>
        <url/>
    </scm>
    <properties>
        <java.version>21</java.version>
    </properties>
    <dependencies>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-flyway</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-validation</artifactId>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc</artifactId>
        </dependency>

        <dependency>
            <groupId>com.h2database</groupId>
            <artifactId>h2</artifactId>
            <scope>runtime</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-test</artifactId>
            <scope>test</scope>
        </dependency>
        <dependency>
            <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
            <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
            <!-- <optional>true</optional> -->
        </dependency>
    </dependencies>


    <build>
        <plugins>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.apache.maven.plugins</groupId>
                <artifactId>maven-compiler-plugin</artifactId>
                <version>3.14.0</version>
                <configuration>
                  <annotationProcessorPaths>
                    <path>
                      <groupId>org.projectlombok</groupId>
                      <artifactId>lombok</artifactId>
                      <version>1.18.40</version>
                    </path>
                  </annotationProcessorPaths>
                </configuration>
              </plugin>
            <plugin>
                <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
                <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId>
            </plugin>
        </plugins>
    </build>

</project>

and this is my applicaton.properties file

spring.application.name=springfs-pet-clinic
spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=create
spring.h2.console.enabled=true
spring.h2.console.path=/h2-console

everything is working well except for the h2-console in the browser

answers.body:
Quick Answer

Since Spring Boot version: 4.0.0-M1.

in pom.xml add

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-boot-h2console</artifactId>
</dependency>

github release notes

https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/releases

  • v4.0.0-M1 Pre-release - ⭐ New Features

    • Create spring-boot-h2console module #46113

H2Console is loaded by H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration of spring-boot-autoconfigure.

Spring Boot 3.5.6

spring-boot-autoconfigure-3.5.6.jar

└── org
    └── springframework
        └── boot
            └── autoconfigure
                └── h2
                    ├── H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration$H2ConsoleLogger.class
                    ├── H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration.class
                    ├── H2ConsoleProperties$Settings.class
                    └── H2ConsoleProperties.class

Spring Boot 4.0.0-M3

spring-boot-autoconfigure-4.0.0-M3.jar

remove h2 (H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration, ...)

└── org
    └── springframework
        └── boot
            └── autoconfigure

spring-boot-h2console-4.0.0-M3.jar

You can see that H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration is removed from spring-boot-autoconfigure-4.0.0-M3, but added to spring-boot-h2console-4.0.0-M3.

└── org
    └── springframework
        └── boot
            └── h2console
                └── autoconfigure
                    ├── H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration$H2ConsoleLogger.class
                    ├── H2ConsoleAutoConfiguration.class
                    ├── H2ConsoleProperties$Settings.class
                    ├── H2ConsoleProperties.class
                    └── package-info.class

For Spring Boot 4.0.0-M3

in pom.xml add

<dependency>
  <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
  <artifactId>spring-boot-h2console</artifactId>
</dependency>

Update Announcement

When testing Spring Boot 4.0, please ensure you add all necessary dependencies using the ADD DEPENDENCIES... feature directly from the Spring Initializr (https://start.spring.io/).

Do not simply modify the Spring Boot version to 4.0 in an existing (older) project.

Please use the Spring Initializr (https://start.spring.io/) to generate the ZIP file template for your first Spring Boot 4.0 project.

This is because the names of some key starter dependencies have been changed/updated in Spring Boot 4.0.

replace your

<dependency>
            <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
            <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc</artifactId>
        </dependency>

with the

<dependency>
    <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId>
    <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId>
</dependency>

webmvc does not include embedded server

this should work

question_comments.body: How is it not working? What error messages are you seeing in the browser also in the logs?

Welcome to Stack Overflow! Please clarify your specific problem or add additional details to highlight exactly what you need. As it's currently written, it’s hard to tell exactly what is the issue. "it didn't work for me" is not a specific error . See How to Ask for help clarifying this question. As part of a minimal reproducible example add steps for reproduction and verbatim errors or symptoms.

79796353.body: thank you it worked for me when  i replaced the wbmvc with web

79796237.body: But starting from v4, isn't it the default dependency for Spring Web? <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc</artifactId>
